Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the communication cable of indoor unit. Check the DC output voltage at the communication terminal.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Indoor unit/outdoor unit communication time-out error: errors in more than 6 packets
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the outdoor communication cable connection. Check DC output voltage and the communication terminal.
Check indoor unit room temperature sensor. Check indoor unit PCB connector CN41 (White)
Check indoor unit pipe sensor. Check indoor PCB connector CN41 (White)

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Indoor unit Eva in sensor disconnection
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the disconnection of indoor unit pipe sensor.
Check indoor unit float sensor. Check indoor PCB connector CN5 (black)
Check the communication connection between indoor and outdoor units. Check the power line and communication cable connection status.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication error between indoor/outdoor INVIMAIN <-> MICOM (1 min)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check MAIN MICOM Check INVERTER MICOM
Check sensor connection status Check sensor location Check sensor resistance
Check sensor connection status Check sensor location Check sensor resistance
Check sensor connection status Check sensor location Check sensor resistance
Check the operation setting state Check temperature sensor
Check input power connection status Check the connection status between the motor and outdoor unit of PCB Check indoor/outdoor fuse
Check the compressor connection status Check the resistance between different phases of the compressor

Error Codes.errorMeaning: [Inverter] Total current error / PFC over current error
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the input power Check the coolant charging status Check the normal operation of outdoor fan

Check coolant charging Check the compressor connection status and normal operation Check the obstacles around the indoor and outdoor units Check whether the outdoor unit service valve is open Check whether the indoor/outdoor installation pipe/wiring are correct
Check the compressor connection status Check the resistance between different phases of the compressor
Check input power Check AC power connection Restart in 3 minutes
Check the compressor connection status Check the resistance between different phases of the compressor
Check EEPROM DATA Check the normal operation of PCB
Check the input power connection Check the status of RY21 and R200 in the INVERTER PCB
Check EEPROM DATA Check the normal operation of PCB
Check the input power connection status Check the connection status of the motor and the outdoor unit PCB Check the indoor/outdoor unit fuse
Check the coolant charging status Check the indoor EVA sensor Check if the outdoor unit service value is open Check that the indoor/outdoor installation pipe/wiring are correct
Check the option code of the indoor unit

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication error between the indoor unit and wired remote controller
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the connection wire between the indoor unit and the wired remote controller

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication error between the Master and Slave wired remote controllers
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the option switch for defining the master and slave (only one master and one slave can exist)
Check that wired remote controller is connected to the COM2 terminal of the indoor unit

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication error between the Master and Slave wired remote controllers.
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Check the option switch for defining the master and slave (only one master and one slave can exist)

Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: Indoor unit ($POUSPM kit) orders emergency stop. Check the indoor unit ($POUSPM kit)
Control kit quantity must be matched with outdoor unit 1 by 1. Check the $POUSPM kit quantity. It must be 1EA.

Troubleshooting.errorMeaning: Detection of outdoor freezing when compressor stops.
Protection of outdoor overload when compressor stops.
Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: Compressor is overloaded. Please check same as E461 and check compressor when it starts.

Troubleshooting.errorMeaning: Discharge temperature of a compressor in an outdoor unit is overheated.
Heating operation is not available since the outdoor air temperature is over 35 degrees.
Cooling operation is not available since the outdoor air temperature is lower than -15 degrees.

Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: Compressor is overloaded. Please check same as E461 and check compressor when it starts.
EEPROM date is wrong. Exchange EEPROM or MAIN PBA. (This error doesn’t occur in EMF 150-AM)

Troubleshooting.errorMeaning: IPM (IGBT Module) or PFCM temperature sensor error

Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: Check reactor located in control plate. If reactor is normal, exchange INVERTER PEA.
Check INVERTER PBA’s temperature. Power off and cool down INVERTER P BA, and then restart the outdoor unit.

Troubleshooting.errorMeaning: Capacity mismatching between indoor and outdoor
Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: EEPROM data is wrong. Exchange EEPROM or MAIN PBA

Troubleshooting.errorMeaning: Option code miss matching among the indoors (only for DPM)
Troubleshooting.possibleSolution: EEPROM data is wrong. (This error doesn’t occur in EMF 150-AM)

Ensure flow sensor is fitted onto pipework and connected to Samsung PCB. Ensure flow rate is above 16 litres per minute. Ensure all air is removed from system. Check circulation pumps speed setting. Check zone valves are not sticking closed. Check direction of flow sensor on pipework. Check direction of pump on pipework. Check direction of Flow Meter on pipework.
Check circulation pumps are not operating. Check flow sensor is installed on horizontal pipework. Ensure 150mm of horizontal pipework each side of flow sensor.
